Name: The Festivals of Hideaway
Description: Though everyone in Hideaway has a night to celebrate a festival of their own making, most dedicate their efforts to one of three great events.

ChildBranches.Name: The Silent Reel
ChildBranches.Description: Throughout the night, the people will dance. There will be no music, nor any obligations to conform to a particular style.

ChildBranches.Name: The Hour of Our Reflection
ChildBranches.Description: There is a dweller too ancient and too mad to help maintain Hideaway. Instead, the Suggester serves a ceremonial role: during the festival, they bark out a phrase, which everyone then represents through art. Invariably, the topics are variations on "handsome Temtum's generosity," or "Hideaway's superb lifestyles."

ChildBranches.Name: The Rainbowing
ChildBranches.Description: Revellers will indulge in a colourful feast, featuring the finest food Hideaway can manage to find in the abyssal depths.
